events.text:
[i] Alright, let’s see how best to do this.
[i] I was brought on for my card skills, so I have to make sure I can pay back The House but still make enough for my family.
[i] Ozo is the grumpiest, and that guy in the back looks like he works for him. Definitely don’t want to be on their bad side.
[i] Finnigan seemed to be a bit overconfident, I think remember seeing him on the news as some CEO so he definitely has a lot of money.
[i] And Tippy, she’s very forward and flirty like she wants to get her way, but I heard another Dealer mention that she’s given bribes before. 
[i] With my skills right now, I can swap out cards from the top of the deck pretty easily while dealing, and this table should be able to quickly rotate a bit if I need to swap people’s hands.
[i] As long as I balance out who wins, I should be able to make enough but still seem fair and make my money. [/i]
